SEARCH
Package it.polimi.it.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameController extends Object implements Serializable
Main Controller of the project. Deals with the players, their model classes and the turns of the game.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • turnDealer

      public void turnDealer() throws InvalidIDException, IOException
      Method used to control which player needs to move in the current turn
      Throws:
      InvalidIDException - exception used when the game ID is wrong or non-existent
      IOException

    • checkIfEverybodyIsDisconnected

      public boolean checkIfEverybodyIsDisconnected()
      Method that checks if any participant of the game is still online
      Returns:
      a boolean value: true->somebody is still online false->everybody is offline or disconnected.

    • firstOperation

      public void firstOperation() throws IOException, InvalidIDException
      Method to get the maximum possible number of tiles that can be selected from the board Calls the view to ask the payer about how many tiles the player wants to retrieve
      Throws:
      IOException
      InvalidIDException

    • getFromViewNTiles

      public void getFromViewNTiles(String user, int chosenNumber) throws WrongPlayerException, IOException, IllegalValueException, InvalidIDException
      Gets from the view the number of tiles that the current player wants to retrieve from the board The method also sends to the view the list of lists of tiles that the user can choose in order to highlight them on the board.
      Parameters:
      chosenNumber - is the input from the user
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException
      IOException
      IllegalValueException
      InvalidIDException

    • getTilesListFromView

      public void getTilesListFromView(String user, List<Tile> chosenList) throws WrongPlayerException, WrongListException, IllegalValueException, InvalidIDException, IOException, WrongTileException
      Method to get the list of tiles the user has selected from the board, The method also sends to the view the list of 'empty-enough' columns in which the chosen tiles might be put in.
      Parameters:
      chosenList - is the list of selected tiles
      Throws:
      WrongTileException - exception used when a wrong tile is selected
      WrongPlayerException
      WrongListException
      IllegalValueException
      InvalidIDException
      IOException

    • getColumnFromView

      public void getColumnFromView(String user, int col) throws IllegalValueException, InvalidIDException, IOException
      Method that gets from the view the column that the player wants to put his chosen tiles and in which order he wants the tiles to be. The method also calls the view to display the new points acquired by the player
      Parameters:
      col - is the column of the shelfie where to put the tiles in
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException
      InvalidIDException
      IOException

    • firstTurnStarter

      public void firstTurnStarter() throws IOException, InvalidIDException
      Method used to initialize the parameters of the game, called before the firs turn of the game Calls the view in order to display the initial board and the cards that have been extracted randomly
      Throws:
      IOException
      InvalidIDException
